short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Have full-control over noisy tabs (active tab, all tabs, all other tabs, and more) with keyboard shortcut support
short.de: Volle Kontrolle über verrauschte Registerkarten mit Tastaturkurzbefehl-Unterstützung
short.es: Control total de las pestañas ruidosas con accesos directos del teclado
short.fr: Maîtriser les onglets bruyants grâce à la prise en charge des raccourcis clavier
short.it: Avere il pieno controllo sulle schede rumorose con il supporto delle scorciatoie da tastiera
short.ja: キーボードショートカットのサポートにより、ノイズの多いタブ（アクティブタブ、すべてのタブ、他のすべてのタブなど）をフルコントロールできます。
short.nl: Volledige controle over lawaaierige tabbladen met ondersteuning voor sneltoetsen
short.pl: Pełna kontrola nad hałaśliwymi kartami z obsługą skrótów klawiaturowych
short.pt_BR: Ter controle total sobre abas ruidosas com suporte de atalhos de teclado
short.pt_PT: Ter controlo total sobre abas ruidosas com suporte de atalhos de teclado
short.ru: Имеют полный контроль над шумными вкладками с поддержкой клавиатурных сокращений
short.zh_CN: 通过键盘快捷键支持，可以完全控制嘈杂的标签页（活动标签页、所有标签页、所有其他标签页等）。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This browser extension provides control over muting, unmuting, and closing noisy tabs. When a tab is muted, it can still play video and audio streams silently, ensuring that unexpected noises from browser tabs, particularly ads and banners, don't interrupt your work. This feature is especially useful during meetings or online conferences. You can mute or unmute tabs with just one click. It uses a nonpersistent background script, which means it doesn't consume any resources unless actively used by the user.

Key Features:
1. Mute individual tabs
2. Mute other tabs in the current window
3. Mute tabs in other windows
4. Mute all tabs except the active one
5. Mute all incognito tabs
6. Monitor and mute newly opened tabs
7. Support dark mode (dark theme)

This extension allows you to toggle the muting state of the currently active tab, tabs in the current window, tabs in other windows, and all tabs except the active one. You can mute and unmute specific noisy tabs or enforce the muting state for all matching tabs. Additionally, you can close other noisy tabs using a single keyboard shortcut.

You can access the extension's controls either through the toolbar popup or by setting custom keyboard shortcuts, based on your preference. User-defined keyboard shortcuts provide access to all supported actions for muting and unmuting tabs.

Please note that this extension does not support custom rules for muting specific hostnames, as this functionality is already available in your browser and doesn't require duplication.

This project is open-source, and you can find the source code at https://github.com/balvin-perrie/mute-tab/.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
This extension offers full control over muting and unmuting browser tabs. The extension uses a nonpersistent background script which means it does not use any resource unless it is actually being used by the user. 

This extension can toggle muting of the currently active tab, tabs in the current window, tabs in other windows and all tabs except the active one.

The extension's controls can be accessed from the toolbar popup or by defining custom keyboard shortcuts if you prefer so. All supported actions for muting and unmuting tabs are accessible by custom keyboard shortcuts.

Note that this extension does not support defining custom rules to mute for instance specified hostnames since your browser already has this functionality and there is no need for that.
